description: This file contains CSS styles for the main application layout, theme management, and responsive design for the simple notes web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container class that sets the text alignment, background color, and transitions for theme changes.

classes.name: app-main-content
classes.description: Container for the main content of the application, with padding to account for the navbar height.

classes.name: app-list
classes.description: Styling for the left pane where the list of notes is displayed.

classes.name: app-detail
classes.description: Styling for the right pane that displays the details of a selected note.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Defines the header area of the application with specific styling for layout and appearance.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button that toggles between light and dark themes.
